name: Bootstraps - Mission Package Series
tagline: Mission Controller Extended Add-on for Kerbal Space Program
body:
### Project Description
This is a project to create a series of mission packages for the Mission Controller Extended (MC) mod in conjunction with Kerbal Space Program (KSP). The goal is to provide a pathway for new players to learn the game in a fashion similar to how real life space programs developed. Much of the inspiration for this project came from the NASA and Soviet programs, condensing things where I felt necessary and providing a clean flow.

The initial scope is two-fold - programs within Kerbal's sphere of influence (Kerbal SOI.mpkg) and interplanetary programs (Interplanetary.mpkg).

### Current Packages
Current Packages:

* [Kerbal SOI](https://github.com/ihavealamp/MC_Bootstraps_Package/wiki/Kerbal-SOI)
* [Interplanetary](https://github.com/ihavealamp/MC_Bootstraps_Package/wiki/Interplanetary)

WIP Packages:

* Orbital Infrastructure

Prospective Packages:

* Interlunatary
* K-Plane
* Reusable Launch Platform
* Surface Infrastructure
* Mining Operations
* Survival Mode

### Roadmap/Schedule
Short-Term Focus:

* Test basic functionality for all missions
* Add basic descriptions for all goals

Mid-Term Focus:

* Add full descriptions for all missions and goals
* Build additional mission packages

Long-Term Focus:

* Gather feedback on mission rewards and fine-tune
* Transition mission rewards from mission completion to goal completion

### Contact
Please feel free to submit any [issues, bugs or enhancement requests here](https://github.com/ihavealamp/MC_Bootstraps_Package/issues/new). I can also be reached through my GitHub profile for general questions (@ihavealamp)
